vicario_pcp.tool

Class ColorSpaceConvertion

  • java.lang.Object
    • vicario_pcp.tool.ColorSpaceConvertion

  • public final class ColorSpaceConvertion
extends java.lang.Object
    Basic color space conversion utilities, assuming two degree observer and illuminant D65.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.7 $
    Author:
    Jarek Sacha

      Conversion from sRGB to CIE XYZ as defined in the IEC 619602-1 standard (http://www.colour.org/tc8-05/Docs/colorspace/61966-2-1.pdf) r = R / 255; g = G / 255; b = B / 255; r_linear = r > 0.04045 ?

      /** Conversion from CIE XYZ to CIE L*a*b* assuming Observer. = 2, Illuminant = D65.
      static void xyzToRGB(float[] xyz, float[] rgb)
      Conversion from CIE XYZ to sRGB as defined in the IEC 619602-1 standard (http://www.colour.org/tc8-05/Docs/colorspace/61966-2-1.pdf) r_linear = +3.2406 * X - 1.5372 * Y - 0.4986 * Z; g_linear = -0.9689 * X + 1.8758 * Y + 0.0415 * Z; b_linear = +0.0557 * X - 0.2040 * Y + 1.0570 * Z; r = r_linear > 0.0031308 ?

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • xyzToRGB

        public static void xyzToRGB(float[] xyz,
                            float[] rgb)
        Conversion from CIE XYZ to sRGB as defined in the IEC 619602-1 standard (http://www.colour.org/tc8-05/Docs/colorspace/61966-2-1.pdf) 
         r_linear = +3.2406 * X - 1.5372 * Y - 0.4986 * Z;
 g_linear = -0.9689 * X + 1.8758 * Y + 0.0415 * Z;
 b_linear = +0.0557 * X - 0.2040 * Y + 1.0570 * Z;
 r = r_linear > 0.0031308
       ? 1.055 * Math.pow(r_linear, (1 / 2.4)) - 0.055
       : 12.92 * r_linear;
 g = g_linear > 0.0031308
       ? 1.055 * Math.pow(g_linear, (1 / 2.4)) - 0.055
       : 12.92 * g_linear;
 b = b_linear > 0.0031308
       ? 1.055 * Math.pow(b_linear, (1 / 2.4)) - 0.055
       : 12.92 * b_linear;
 R = r * 255
 G = r * 255
 B = r * 255
 
        

        

        Parameters:
        

        xyz - input CIE XYZ values.
        

        rgb - output sRGB values in [0, 255] range.
        

        

        • 

      




        

      • 

        labToXYZ
        

        public static void labToXYZ(float[] lab,
                            float[] xyz)
        

        Conversion from CIE L*a*b* to CIE XYZ assuming Observer. = 2, Illuminant
 = D65. Conversion based on formulas provided at
 http://www.brucelindbloom.com/index.html?Eqn_RGB_XYZ_Matrix.html
        

        

        Parameters:
        

        lab - input CIE L*a*b* values.
        

        xyz - output CIE XYZ values.
        

        

        • 

      




        

      • 

        rgbToXYZ
        

        public static void rgbToXYZ(float[] rgb,
                            float[] xyz)
        

        Conversion from sRGB to CIE XYZ as defined in the IEC 619602-1 standard
 (http://www.colour.org/tc8-05/Docs/colorspace/61966-2-1.pdf)
 
         r = R / 255;
 g = G / 255;
 b = B / 255;
 r_linear = r > 0.04045
          ? Math.pow((r + 0.055) / 1.055, 2.4)
          : r / 12.92;
 g_linear = g > 0.04045
          ? Math.pow((g + 0.055) / 1.055, 2.4)
          : g / 12.92;
 b_linear = b > 0.04045
          ? Math.pow((b + 0.055) / 1.055, 2.4)
          : b / 12.92;
 X = 0.4124 * r_linear + 0.3576 * g_linear + 0.1805 * b_linear;
 Y = 0.2126 * r_linear + 0.7152 * g_linear + 0.0722 * b_linear;
 Z = 0.0193 * r_linear + 0.1192 * g_linear + 0.9505 * b_linear;
 
        

        

        Parameters:
        

        rgb - source sRGB values. Size of array rgb must be at
 least 3. If size of array rgb larger than three then only
 first 3 values are used.
        

        xyz - destinaltion CIE XYZ values. Size of array xyz
 must be at least 3. If size of array xyz larger than three
 then only first 3 values are used.
        

        

        • 

      




        

      • 

        xyzToLab
        

        public static void xyzToLab(float[] xyz,
                            float[] lab)
        

        /**
 Conversion from CIE XYZ to CIE L*a*b* assuming Observer. = 2, Illuminant
 = D65. Conversion based on formulas provided at
 http://www.brucelindbloom.com/index.html?Eqn_RGB_XYZ_Matrix.html
        

        

        Parameters:
        

        xyz - source CIE XYZ values. Size of array xyz must be
 at least 3. If size of array xyz larger than three then only
 first 3 values are used.
        

        lab - destinaltion CIE L*a*b* values. Size of array lab
 must be at least 3. If size of array lab larger than three
 then only first 3 values are used.
